name: Rick App
tagline: play automatic burp in silent situations
body: # Rick App **play automatic burp in silent situations** The Rick-App plays a automatic burp in silent situations. This App makes it possible to talk like Rick in *Rick and Morty*. Support me: ![Flattr This](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/no-go/RickApp/master/flattr.png) [APK File](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/no-go/RickApp/master/app/app-release.apk) or get the App from [f-Droid](http://f-droid.org) ## App Icon ![logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/no-go/RickApp/master/app/src/main/res/mipmap-xhdpi/ic_launcher.png) ## Features - Threshold ruler: modify the noise limit - RickApp plays a burp sound, if there is a realy short time without noise - It plays a new burp only after 2 seconds to protect from endless burps - If your mobile plays sound, RickApp *hears* it, too. - RickApp shows the sound sampling values in a textbox Your Screen is off, but RickApp does not sleep! Use the *recent App* feature of your Homescreen and close RickApp by swiping it away. This App uses the microphone! You can not use the microphone, if you get a call and RickApp works! ## Screenshot ![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/no-go/RickApp/master/screenshot.jpg) ## License I publish everything under the free BSD-2 License.
